Events.CanCreate:
(switch ; Player must have a mining weapon.
(not (objGetItems gPlayerShip "wI +property:damageMining;")) Nil
; If player has failed this mission previously, then no ; chance of getting it.
(typ@ gType 'blacklisted) Nil
True )
Events.OnAccepted:
(block ( (ownerObj (objGetObjByID (msn@ gSource 'ownerID))) (currency (msn@ gSource 'currency))
; Find an appropriate asteroid
(allAsteroids (sysFindObject ownerObj "t +asteroid; R:60; +property:size>=250;")) (asteroidList (filter allAsteroids asteroidObj (and (not (sysFindObject asteroidObj "T +populated; N:60;")) (not (objGetOverlays asteroidObj)) ) ) ) (asteroidObj (if asteroidList (random asteroidList) (block ( ; Find the most distant planet (centerStar (sysFindObject gSource "tN +star;")) (farthestPlanet (sysFindObject (or centerStar ownerObj) "tR +isPlanet:true;"))
; Pick a random distance beyond the farthest planet (meanDist (if farthestPlanet (sysVectorDistance (objGetPos farthestPlanet)) (random 600 900))) (dist (+ meanDist (random -60 60))) ) ; Create an asteroid at this distance (sysCreateStation &stRockyAsteroidSizeD; (sysVectorRandom Nil dist 60 "t")) ) ) )
(asteroidType (obj@ asteroidObj 'asteroidType)) (overlayType (switch (= asteroidType 'icy) &ovRescueStructureIce;
(= asteroidType 'metallic) &ovRescueStructureMetallic;
(= asteroidType 'primordial) &ovRescueStructurePrimordial;
(= asteroidType 'volcanic) &ovRescueStructureVolcanic;
&ovRescueStructureRocky; ) )
(distToAsteroid (objGetDistance ownerObj asteroidObj)) (travelTime (sysCalcTravelTime distToAsteroid (obj@ gPlayerShip 'maxSpeed)))
overlayID ) ; If the asteroid does not have a name, name it now
(if (or (= (objGetName asteroidObj 0) "") (= (subset (objGetName asteroidObj 0) 0 1) "(") ) (objSetName asteroidObj (cat "Asteroid " (random 10000 99999))) )
; Add the appropriate overlay ; ; NOTE: We don't need to match the rotation of the asteroid. ; the overlay does that automatically. ; ; NOTE: Hit points on cavern overlay is automatically ; computed based on system level.
(setq overlayID (objAddOverlay asteroidObj overlayType (objGetPos asteroidObj) 0))
; Set the time before miners start dying.
(ovrSet@ asteroidObj overlayID 'safeTime (+ travelTime 300)) (dbgOutput "Safe time set to: " (ovr@ asteroidObj overlayID 'safeTime))
; Set the number of miners trapped.
(ovrSet@ asteroidObj overlayID 'minersTrapped (msn@ gSource 'minersTrapped))
; Set the mission on the overlay, so we get appropriate ; events.
(ovrSet@ asteroidObj overlayID 'missionID (objGetID gSource))
; Remember
(msnSet@ gSource 'targetID (objGetID asteroidObj)) (msnSet@ gSource 'cavernID overlayID)
(msnSet@ gSource 'maxReward (* (msn@ gSource 'rewardPerMiner) (msn@ gSource 'minersTrapped))) )
Events.OnCompleted:
(switch (= aReason 'success) (block () (msnSet@ gSource 'minersRescued (@ gData 'minersRescued)) (msnSet@ gSource 'reward (* (@ gData 'minersRescued) (msn@ gSource 'rewardPerMiner))) )
(= aReason 'failure) (block () (switch (= (@ gData 'result) 'allDead) Nil
; If we fail for a different reason (e.g., out ; of system for too long) then we remove all ; miners
(block ( (asteroidObj (objGetObjByID (msn@ gSource 'targetID))) (overlayID (msn@ gSource 'cavernID)) ) (ovrSet@ asteroidObj overlayID 'minersLeft 0) ) )
; Player never gets this mission again (msnSet@ gType 'blacklisted True) ) )

(block ( (minersTrapped (msn@ gSource 'minersTrapped)) (minersRescued (msn@ gSource 'minersRescued)) (trData { missionNumber: (+ (msn@ gSource 'missionNumber) 1) targetName: (objGetName (objGetObjByID (msn@ gSource 'targetID))) minersTrapped: minersTrapped minersRescued: minersRescued reward: (msn@ gSource 'reward) }) ) (switch (= minersTrapped minersRescued) (or (typTranslate (msn@ gSource 'character.missionGiver) 'mining05.success.allRescued trData) (msnTranslate gSource 'textSuccessDebrief.allRescued trData) )
(= minersRescued 1) (or (typTranslate (msn@ gSource 'character.missionGiver) 'mining05.success.oneRescued trData) (msnTranslate gSource 'textSuccessDebrief.oneRescued trData) )
(or (typTranslate (msn@ gSource 'character.missionGiver) 'mining05.success.someRescued trData) (msnTranslate gSource 'textSuccessDebrief.someRescued trData) ) ) )

An asteroid mine has collapsed, leaving many miners trapped in the wreckage. Go to %targetName% and use a mining weapon to dig out the wreckage and rescue the miners.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: %reward%

The colony supervisor stands on a plaform at the center of the hall.
"%name%, I've got a priority mission for you."

"An asteroid mine in the system has collapsed, leaving %minersTrapped% miners buried in the wreckage.
"I want you to go out there are dig them out with your mining equipment. What do you say?"
"Good. Hurry up! They'll be running out of air soon."
Language.String: "Come back when you're ready. You're their only hope."
Language.Text:
"What are you doing here? There's no time to waste—those miners will be running out of air soon.
"Remember to use your mining equipment to dig out the wreckage."

The colony supervisor looks ecstatic.
"This has been a miraculous day! We were all fearing the worst, but you managed to rescue all the miners!
"Congratulations! We've deposited %reward% in your account, and you deserve every credit."

The colony supervisor looks relieved.
"It's been a long day. We mourn those that were lost even while celebrating the rescue of %minersRescued% miners.
"For your efforts, we've deposited %reward% in your account."

The colony supervisor looks sad.
"We've paid a terrible price. All but one miner has perished in the accident and we're devastated that you were unable to save more.
"We've deposited %reward% in your account."

The colony supervisor looks stunned.
"Your incompetence has left %minersTrapped% miners dead. I should never have trusted you with this mission."
